reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The fan does provide a powerful stream of air and provides sufficient white noise if you're using it for that purpose. However, the fan doesn't have longevity. The motor in mine has stopped working after a year and a half. I will not purchase again. I can purchase a similar fan with a better longevity rating at a comparable price point.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very powerful fan for it's size and weight. Because it's relatively small and very light, it's easy for me to move around as needed. It's also not as loud as most fans as powerful as this one. Great for the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact Powerhouse - Amazon Basics 7-Inch Air Circulator Fan Review
reviews.reviewText: I recently invested in the Amazon Basics 3 Speed Small Room Air Circulator Fan with a 7-Inch Blade in Black, and it has proven to be a cooling powerhouse in a compact design. This fan combines functionality, portability, and efficiency, making it an ideal addition to any small room. Here's why the Amazon Basics Air Circulator Fan deserves a place in your cooling arsenal.Powerful Air Circulation (5/5):The standout feature of this fan is its ability to circulate air effectively. Despite its compact size, the 7-inch blade packs a punch, creating a refreshing breeze that reaches every corner of the room. The three-speed settings provide versatility to tailor the airflow to your comfort level.Compact and Portable Design (5/5):The Amazon Basics Air Circulator Fan's compact design is a game-changer for those with limited space. It easily fits on desks, countertops, or bedside tables without taking up much room. The portable nature allows you to move it effortlessly between different areas, ensuring cool comfort wherever you go.Quiet Operation (5/5):One of the most appreciated aspects of this fan is its quiet operation. Even at the highest speed setting, it maintains a low noise level, making it suitable for use in bedrooms, offices, or study spaces without causing disruptions. The quiet performance adds to its appeal for both work and relaxation environments.Sturdy Build and Modern Aesthetics (5/5):The fan's build is sturdy and durable, ensuring longevity and reliable performance. The modern black design adds a touch of elegance to its aesthetics, making it a stylish addition to any room. The sleek appearance complements various decor styles, blending seamlessly into the surroundings.Adjustable Tilt for Targeted Cooling (5/5):The adjustable tilt feature allows for targeted cooling. Whether you prefer a direct breeze or a more diffused airflow, the ability to tilt the fan ensures that you can customize the cooling experience to suit your preferences. This flexibility is a thoughtful addition for personalized comfort.Energy-Efficient Cooling Solution (5/5):The Amazon Basics Air Circulator Fan is an energy-efficient cooling solution. It effectively cools small rooms without consuming excessive power, making it an eco-friendly choice. The combination of power and energy efficiency makes it a practical addition to your home.User-Friendly Controls (5/5):The fan's controls are user-friendly and straightforward. The clearly labeled buttons for the three-speed settings are easy to navigate, allowing for quick adjustments. The simplicity of the controls enhances the overall user experience, ensuring hassle-free operation.Affordable Cooling Comfort (5/5):Considering the powerful air circulation, compact and portable design, quiet operation, sturdy build, modern aesthetics, adjustable tilt, energy efficiency, and user-friendly controls, the Amazon Basics 7-Inch Air Circulator Fan offers affordable cooling comfort. Its combination of features makes it a cost-effective solution for staying cool in small spaces.Conclusion:In conclusion, the Amazon Basics 3 Speed Small Room Air Circulator Fan with a 7-Inch Blade in Black delivers on its promise of efficient and affordable cooling. With powerful air circulation, compact design, quiet operation, sturdy build, modern aesthetics, adjustable tilt, energy efficiency, and user-friendly controls, this fan provides a refreshing breeze without compromising on style or functionality. Highly recommended for those seeking a reliable and budget-friendly cooling solution for small spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I guess big makes it durable? But very situational...
reviews.reviewText: Needed a fan to put on my desk at work and though that this one might work... Well, it "works", but I had to work around the fan, not the fan work for me.First off The fan is slightly more bulky that I had expected, even after watching videos. To be clear, this is not a small fan, but it is not huge. but this fan is intended to be more of a small shop fan. So far, decent fan, runs quiet, good air flow volume, in general, function great as a fan.So that bring me to what I don't like. The fan clicks into 5 static positions, approximately 18 degree increments from 0 to 90 degrees, or straight forward to straight up. There is no downward tilt, so you will need to have an incline if you want a slight downward direction. This was not really illustrated in the videos, though now that I know, I can see they never demonstrated it as a feature, so I can't gripe.Another thing that isn't really shown is that you can hang this from two anchor slots on the bottom back of the base, so you can ceiling mount or wall mount the fan, though I would be leery of a "sideways mounting, as the anchors are designed for the weight to go forward in relation of the fan, so if you were to wall mount it, I would make sure it has a downward tilt, unless you are supporting it in another manner.Other than fan motor itself, everything is mechanically manual. No oscillation/turning motor, no "natural" speed setting, just off, "light", medium, and "it is messing up my hair" speeds (0,1,2,3). Would be a great fan for mounting on a ceiling to circulate air or an easy to use floor fan. Personally think it is a hair too big for a desk fan though.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this fan to provide some white noise in our bedroom. It works great! Not too loud, and moves some air. So far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very powerful fan for it's size and price point!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this fan to replace a full size oscillating fan for my bedroom. I find myself extremely impressed by the amount of air this little fan can move. I have it about 15 feet from my bed and was convinced I'd barely feel it. That was not the case at all. I think the output is equal to, or greater, than the previous one I owned. I like the compact size, it's neither too tall nor wide nor deep.There are only 2 minor drawbacks to this product:1. It's pretty loud on the highest setting and makes things near it vibrate, which also causes more noise, which isn't great.2. The dial switch is on the back and isn't the most intuitive place for it to be. I will give the dial credit though, it's way more heavy duty than I expected, which is a pretty big bonus.Even with the minor drawbacks, I'd certainly buy another one if I was ever in the market for one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size and quiet fan for bedroom!
reviews.reviewText: Needed something a little more quieter for my bedroom fan. This fits the bill perfectly! With 3 speed settings, instead of the normal 2 settings on most portable fans, I usually use the medium speed. That way there's good air movement and some dampening of sound, but not too much to not be able to hear if there is an emergency in the home. Love this!

Good white noise at top level, works well as a fan for cooling you off, first two modes are quiet so if you don't want it loud, you can make it not loud (I want it loud lol) and yeah decent money, good buy.

Compre este ventilador porque creí que era sólo para escritorio y me doy cuenta que se puede poner en piso también, no es tan pequeño como esperaba y tiene buena potencia de aire, me sorprendió mucho porque no es casi nada ruidoso y esta echo completamente de plástico
Excellent product. We will be purchasing more. We highly recommend this product. Perfect white noise

El ventilador es igual a la imagen, llegó antes de la fecha estimada, tiene 3 velocidades que cumplen su función de mantener el lugar fresco. Se observa de material resistente hay que esperar un poco para poder determinar su duración.

reviews.reviewTitle: Bit more noisy and vibrating than it should be.
reviews.reviewText: It's surprisingly hard to find a simple, cheap, mid-sized, weak-ish fan. This one fills that niche... kinda.As is common with fans nowadays, there are only three speeds and they are in reverse order (off, strongest, mid-strength, weakest). I would have preferred for the lowest speed to be a little slower, because the fan is relatively noisy, and worse, it vibrates quite a lot. I have to put it on something soft to absorb the vibrations or I can feel them through the floor (and it makes additional sound).Otherwise it appears to be fine. It doesn't take much space, can be oriented 90 degrees to aim directly up, and circulates the air more than enough. I just hope it's durable.I would have given it 3 stars, but as it's one of the few fans that are of a sensible size/cost (usually it's either super cheap desktop fans or super expensive and encumbering big fans), I'm raising it to 4 stars.
